actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 116-382.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining

official_title: A bill to modify the boundary of the Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument in the State of Arizona, and for other purposes.
short_title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act

summary.text:
Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument Boundary Adjustment Act

This bill modifies the boundary of the Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument in Arizona to include approximately 97.71 acres of identified Forest Service land.

The bill transfers administrative jurisdiction over the Forest Service land from the Forest Service to the National Park Service (NPS).

The NPS shall administer the added land as part of the monument.
